001package net.tvburger.jdl.linalg;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005
006import java.util.function.BiFunction;
007
008public final class Vectors {
009
010    private Vectors() {
011    }
012
013    @SafeVarargs
014    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> of(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, N... values) {
015        Array<N> numbers = typeSupport.createArray(values.length);
016        for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length(); i++) {
017            numbers.set(i, values[i]);
018        }
019        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, false, typeSupport);
020    }
021
022    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> zeros(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int dimensions) {
023        Array<N> numbers = typeSupport.createArray(dimensions);
024        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, false, typeSupport);
025    }
026
027    public static TypedVector<Float> of(float... values) {
028        Float[] floats = new Float[values.length];
029        for (int i = 0; i < floats.length; i++) {
030            floats[i] = values[i];
031        }
032        return new TypedVector<>(Array.of(floats), false, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
033    }
034
035    public static TypedVector<Double> of(double... values) {
036        Double[] doubles = new Double[values.length];
037        for (int i = 0; i < doubles.length; i++) {
038            doubles[i] = values[i];
039        }
040        return new TypedVector<>(Array.of(doubles), false, JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE);
041    }
042
043    public static <N extends Number, M extends Number> TypedVector<M> convert(Vector<N> vector, JavaNumberTypeSupport<M> typeSupport) {
044        Array<M> numbers = typeSupport.createArray(vector.getDimensions());
045        for (int i = 0; i < vector.getDimensions(); i++) {
046            numbers.set(i, typeSupport.valueOf(vector.get(i + 1).doubleValue()));
047        }
048        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, vector.isColumnVector(), typeSupport);
049    }
050
051    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> squared(TypedVector<N> vector) {
052        return new TypedVector<>(vector.asArray().clone().apply(v -> vector.getNumberTypeSupport().multiply(v, v)), vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getNumberTypeSupport());
053    }
054
055    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> squareRoot(TypedVector<N> vector) {
056        return new TypedVector<>(vector.asArray().clone().apply(v -> vector.getNumberTypeSupport().squareRoot(v)), vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getNumberTypeSupport());
057    }
058
059    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> divide(TypedVector<N> vector, TypedVector<N> denominator) {
060        Array<N> values = vector.getNumberTypeSupport().createArray(vector.getDimensions());
061        for (int i = 0; i < values.length(); i++) {
062            values.set(i, vector.getNumberTypeSupport().divide(vector.get(i + 1), denominator.get(i + 1)));
063        }
064        return new TypedVector<>(values, vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getNumberTypeSupport());
065    }
066
067    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> elementWise(TypedVector<N> vector, BiFunction<Integer, N, N> function) {
068        Array<N> values = vector.getNumberTypeSupport().createArray(vector.getDimensions());
069        for (int i = 0; i < values.length(); i++) {
070            values.set(i, function.apply(i + 1, vector.get(i + 1)));
071        }
072        return new TypedVector<>(values, vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getNumberTypeSupport());
073    }
074}
